headline: Eversource Energy (ES): Revisiting Valuation After a Recent Pullback in Share Price Performance
summary: Eversource Energy (ES) has quietly lagged over the past month, even as its year to date performance and 1 year total return still sit comfortably in positive territory. That mix sets up an interesting reset for investors. See our latest analysis for Eversource Energy. That sharp 1 month share price pullback of 11.28 percent contrasts with a 15.05 percent year to date share price return and a respectable 12.01 percent 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests short term momentum is...
